name: FAD
description:
Q: How good are your ears?

FAD is an audio 👂-only game in which you're guided through an underwater maze by a mysterious radio contact 📻.

Interrupting a routine dive, your submarine has just caught a massive electromagnetic pulse, knocking out all the cameras. You have only the most primitive technology on the boat and a mysterious radio contact called Marsha to guide you. How far can you get using just your ears to navigate? And who is Marsha?

What people aren't saying about this game:

The game no one was looking for!

My screen is blank, 1 star.

A real ear-opener!

I don't know what they see in this game.

The only fad that was never popular.

Hmm... I don't like the sound of that.

Note

This is my submission for GitHub Game Off 2021, and in that spirit here is the code. It is somewhat of a crazy experiment, but hope there's some fun hiding in there somewhere. Enjoy (the game, probably not the code)!
